message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105? I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $108. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $108. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $106?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to give you one more chance to meet me at $109. That's the best I can do.
I understand you've compromised a lot, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $107, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. Please consider it.
